reviews.review: A legjobb sci-fi fps,fanoknak kötelező!
Einfach ein Klassiker, zum zweiten mal durchgespielt und macht immer noch Spass.

A Classic FPS that still hold up well when compared to newer FPS games. I have played through this game before, as well as the expansions and I highly recommend them. I haven't yet played the first Half-Life so I might do that also. 

One part that annoyed me though was that I kept dying for no reason when trying to move around this particular train. The only way around it seemed to be to use the 'buddha' console command. To turn on console commands, go to the keyboard section in the options menu, then press '~' to open it up. With the 'buddha' command you will drop to 1 hp but you won't die. After you get around the train you can turn it off by entering the command again. I normally don't like cheating, so it really annoyed that I had to do this. Oh well, the rest of the game is truly epic.
If you like action, gunplay, puzzles, or if youre just looking for a great story, this is the game for you! (9.8/10)

Hlaf life 2 is an exciting game about defiance, rebelion and trust. You are pitted against the forces of the powerful combine armies, a force that threatens to enslave humanity. You along with a band of rebels including; Eli, a briliant scientist, Alyx Elis' daring daughter, Barney, a rebel spy and a mysterious man know only as G-Man must band together to defeat the Combine. But other troubles surface as zombies, aliens and other mutant creatures threaten to stand in your way. You, Dr Gordan Freeman, must rise to defeat these enemies and create peacec across the planet. 

 Half Life 2 is a submersive game with action, puzzle-solving, zombies and guns. What more could you ask for.

This game is an instant classic and no matter who tells you this game is well worth the asking price and is the basis for one of the best mods on steam (garrys mod) and this game continues to be an excellent , excellent fps and is a great and welcome break from COD lol definitely worth it

HALF LIFE 2 REVIEW

Half Life 2 is the first FPS I ever played. I remember when I bought the Orange Box on PS3 I was just amazed! 5 years later replaying it on PC it just adds to the amazing quality of the game. I loved every single second of it and is one my most favorite games of all time. Half Life 2 is a tense, thrilling, and all around amazing game that should be played by everyone.

NOT FOR: People who don't like FPS's. I would still recommend trying it out, but if that's not really your thing, I don't think Half Life 2 would change your mind all that much. However keep in mind that this is more of an old school first person shooter, unlike say Call of Duty. This game doesn't tell you where to go or how to get there, maybe not as much as the original Half-Life, but still a far cry from the crazy hand holding a lot of modern games have today.

FOR: People who want to play or try out a different stlye of FPS. This is not Call of Duty. No constant checkpoints or arrows showing you where to go. While this may prove frustrating for some...(It was for me the first time I tried it.) It proves to be extremely rewarding. On a other note this game doesn't have regenerating health which up's the challenge factor considerably. Even on easy you can every easily die if you don't react fast enough. 

IN CONCLUSION: I hope this review finds you well and if you want some other games like Half Life 2, make sure to get it's sequels Episode 1 & 2 . Also try out Portal and Portal 2 as they are in the same universe. (The Portal series is a puzzle game so it's different, but it's in the same story universe.)  Lastly play the originaly it'll be worth it.

Отличная игра

Абсолютно бестолковая игра... Дело в том, что в ней нет ничего, что можно было бы похвалить.
  
Всеми хваленый геймплей: вы бегаете по локациям и долбите всех встречных врагов монтировкой ("весело")... Можно пострелять и из других оружий, но от этого тоже не получаешь ни капли удовольствия... Даже "Крутой Сэм" в этом плане интереснее. 
Всеми хваленый сюжет: "Проснитесь, Гордон Фримен, вас ждут великие дела." Дальше вам говорят, что вы должны спасти весь мир.... СЮЖЕТ!!!!
Музыки в игре вообще нет.
Единственное, что хорошо выполнено, так это графика... Она действительно очень хороша. Особенно удалась мимика персонажей. Но графика не сможет вытянуть эту игру из говна.  
Скажу так (особенно для деткй (только они в нее сейчас и играют), которые уже приготовили тухлые помидоры): half-life 2 -это такой crysis 3 2004г. Я помню как все тогда удивлялись мега крутой графике: вода, мимика персонажей, всякмие царапинки на на окружении... Это было действительно необычно.

Не реиграбельна, не обладает классным сюжетом, не оригинальна, легка в освоении, как лопата.

Геймплей: 5/10
Графика: 8/10
Звук и музыка: 4/10
Интерфейс и управление: 7/10
Итого: 6/10

One of my first games ever played. I recieved the first copy in this game in the Orange box. I beat the game in around 3 weeks from there and I thought this game was so cool that it was the most amazing game ever. Yet at the time I was also experimenting with other games that people told me to get. Its fun, action-packed, and a great game to have fun with. It might not have a co-op but its definitely fun to play when your internets out. Or if you dont have any friends. It is one of the great games I ever played due to the story line being so unique. Please Gaben I pray you give us HL3. You made such a great game with HL2. I hope you blow our socks to the heavens with Half-life 3.

Half-Life 2 is widely known as one of the greatest games of all time, and for good reason. Almost everything about this game is perfect. The pacing is great, and it keeps you on the edge of your seat from the moment you step out of the train in City 17 right up until the epic conclusion. The guns are punchy, not to mention the Gravity Gun's awesome power. The story is immersive and fantastic, and the entire game feels like a journey, partly due to the fact that there is never a cutscene that you have to sit through. Valve's Source Engine has put so much life into this game, especially the characters. The facial animations are believeable, to the point where I would feel empathy for the characters, the physics are good (Yet sometimes laughable) and the gameplay is fantastic. You are immersed in a living, breathing world right from the get-go. Half-Life 2 is an incredible game that demands to be played by everyone who has any interest in [strike] the shooter genre [/strike] video games at all.

Half-Life 2 is the pinnacle of First-person shooter storytelling and game design. You continue the story of Gordon Freeman, a man who used to work at a CERN-like research facility, until a catastrophic event known as the Resonance Cascade takes place, and aliens from another dimension invade. In this game, after years of what is essentially Cryo-sleep, Freeman wakes up, and is introduced to a resistance group, lead by his former colleagues; fighting against the aliens.

The game also looks great, for its time. It's no Crysis, but the physics are unparalleled, even today. The character models for characters such as Eli, Alyx, and Dr Kleiner are great, for not using Mo-capping, like most AAA games do today.

10/10

This game came out at a great time for me "gaming" wise in my life. First time I loaded this bad-boy up on my old crappy desktop I realised right then this game had me. As bad as my pc was this game still looked beautiful on it, and ran like a champ I might add! 

Valve does a great job with the overall experience and atmosphere in this game. You will undestand that the moment you enter Ravenholm. Being so early on in the game, that one level gives a great representation as to what Half-Life can do to you, and take you. One moment your with your friends and colleagues ready to get the ball rolling and the next your fighting your way through a forgotten town, where the only inhabitants are zombies, headcrab zombies, and a battle-hardened preacher. 

Anyone who has played this game and loved the experience that it brought, can no doubtly go on for endless hours on any one part in this Series - hell, just this title alone can keep you talking - and believe I want to, but honestly what can I say that the game can't already show you itself.

Please, do yourself a favor and play this game if you haven't. The ammount of pure pleasure you can get from this series is just unreal. GOod job Valve. You did it!

Now finish a third one. Geeeeeezzzzz ;D
